feed.subtitle: Write your site description here. It will be used as your sites meta description as well!

entry.title: How to git commit your code into open source project

link.title: How to git commit your code into open source project

entry.content:
7 simple steps

  1. Fork the project repository
  2. Clone forked repository
    Open terminal and execute following command. Replace url with yours. 
    git clone git@github.com:junedmunshi/fb-bot-framework.git
  3. Create new branch (“newfeature”) 
    git branch newfeature
git checkout newfeature
  4. Make modification
  5. Test your code
  6. Commit and push your code 
    git commit -am "YOUR Comment"
git push origin newfeature
  7. Create new pull request

Quick Tip: How to undo push

git push -f origin HEAD^:master
entry.summary:
7 simple steps
Fork the project repository
Clone forked repository
Open terminal and execute following command. Replace url with yours. git clone git@github.com:junedmunshi/fb-bot-framework.git
Create new branch (“newfeature”) git branch newfeature git checkout newfeature
Make modification Test your code Commit and push your code git commit -am "YOUR Comment" git push origin newfeature
Create new pull request

entry.title: How to install github project as module into nodejs project

link.title: How to install github project as module into nodejs project

entry.content:
1. Add following under “dependencies” into package.json 
     "packagename":"username/reponame"

    For example,

     "dependencies": {
 "fb-bot-framework":"junedmunshi/fb-bot-framework"
  }

  2. Install 
    npm install
